4.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Rules of Law about the Prayer during Journey

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas ibn Malik: When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) halted at a certain place (while on a journey), he would not leave that place till he offered the noon prayer. A man said to him: Even if in the middle of the day? He replied: Even if in the middle of the day

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُسَافِرِ يُصَلِّي وَهُوَ يَشُكُّ فِي الْوَقْتِ
chapter.eng-name: A Traveler Praying While He Is Unsure Of The Time
